home.aboutText: I am an aspiring application developer, currently in my third year of a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, specializing in application development. With expertise in software and web development, I am proficient in languages such as Java, Python, React Native, and C, as well as tools like Visual Studio Code, Git, and Figma. My experience includes innovative university projects such as ChillZone and LexiQuest, where I worked in teams to create interactive applications and online games. My approach combines technical rigor and creativity, aiming to deliver high-performance and intuitive digital solutions.
